mapper.select: SELECT SC_NO,--CRUD를 하는 PK키로 넣기 SC_NAME, TO_CHAR(SC_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS SC_START, TO_CHAR(SC_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS SC_END, SC_INFO, SC_CATEGORY, REG_ID, TO_CHAR(MOD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS MOD_DATE, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DATE, --종류별로 컬러를 넣고 싶은 것으로 아래 case문 작성(색상 취향에 따라 선택) CASE --연보라/연핑크/연민트/기본 : 연초록 '신체', '교양', '문화', '교육', '여가' WHEN SC_CATEGORY = '공통' THEN '#E0FFFF' WHEN SC_CATEGORY = '교육' THEN '#E6E6FA' WHEN SC_CATEGORY = '행사' THEN '#6495ED' ELSE '#6495ED' --#FFFFCC / #6495ED / #F0F8FF END AS COLOR /* CASE --연보라/연핑크/연민트/기본 : 연초록 '신체', '교양', '문화', '교육', '여가' WHEN PS_CATEGORY = '교육' THEN '#E0FFFF' WHEN PS_CATEGORY = '문화' THEN '#E6E6FA' WHEN PS_CATEGORY = '신체' THEN '#FFF0F5' WHEN PS_CATEGORY = '교양' THEN '#FFFFCC' WHEN PS_CATEGORY = '여가' THEN '#6495ED' ELSE '#6495ED' --#FFFFCC / #6495ED / #F0F8FF END AS COLOR*/ FROM SCHEDULE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE ( SC_NO, SC_NAME, SC_START, SC_END, SC_INFO, REG_DATE, REG_ID, MOD_DATE,SC_CATEGORY) VALUES ( 200, #{SC_NAME, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TO_DATE(#{SC_START},'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=AMERICAN'), TO_DATE(#{SC_END},'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=AMERICAN'), #{SC_INFO, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{REG_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{SC_CATEGORY, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
